questions.question_text: Which of the following criteria must be met for a process to meet a higher capability level?

choices.B: Capability is demonstrated on the most relevant process activities.
choices.A: All activities of that level are successfully performed.
choices.C: An identified subset of the activities of that level can be executed effectively.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
As for the processes, low capability levels require a subset of these criteria to be satisfied, and higher capability levels require all criteria to be satisfied. PAGE 41
